name: KIM and PROSTITUTE
description:
KIM and PROSTITUTE

In this game you will have to play for one of the last dictators of our time,
but you will not fight against the whole world and not against individual countries,
but only against the army of prostitutes.

You will fly on smollet, shoot from real weapons, you have neither the same allies nor subordinates,
only you, your plane and the army of prostitutes who attack you from airplanes and parachutes,
also bear to forget about the torpedoes that will try to destroy you.

Game features:
  • Opportunity to play for one of the most terrible modern dictators.
  • Opportunity to fight with the army of prostitutes
  • Many naked prostitutes
  • 5000 ACHIEVEMENTs
